name: Pink Skies
description:
Welcome to Pink Skies! You are a pilot in the pink skies with a white and pink airplane. As you fly, you are trying to reach more passengers. However, there are obstacles that try to damage your airplane. If your airplane is completely damaged, it is game over!

Features:

- Great Quality

- Beautiful Scene

- Infinite Game

- Easy Controls

- Physics

- and More!

Play Pink Skies today!
